languages.text: Денз Беллардо оставил солидное наследство. У Вольного Торговца есть шанс вмешаться и повлиять на то, кому оно достанется.
Denz Bellardo left a sizable estate behind. The Rogue Trader has the chance to step in and influence who inherits the lot.
languages.original_text: Денз Беллардо оставил солидное наследство. У Вольного Торговца есть шанс вмешаться и повлиять на то, кому оно достанется.

traits.locale_text: Denz Bellardo left a sizable estate behind. The Rogue Trader has the chance to step in and influence who inherits the lot.
Denz Bellardo left a sizable estate behind. The Rogue Trader has the chance to step in and influence who inherits the lot.
Denz Bellardo left a sizable estate behind. The Rogue Trader has the chance to step in and influence who inherits the lot.
Denz Bellardo left a sizable estate behind. The Rogue Trader has the chance to step in and influence who inherits the lot.

languages.text: 丹兹·贝拉多留下了一笔可观的财产。行商浪人可以插手此事，决定究竟由谁来继承这笔遗产。
languages.original_text: Denz Bellardo left a sizable estate behind. The Rogue Trader has the chance to step in and influence who inherits the lot.

traits.locale_text: 丹兹·贝拉多留下了一笔可观的财产。行商浪人可以插手此事，决定究竟由谁来继承这笔遗产。

languages.text: デンツ・ベラルドは広大な屋敷を残して逝った。自由開拓者が介入して誰が不動産を相続するかに影響を及ぼす機会がある。
languages.original_text: Denz Bellardo left a sizable estate behind. The Rogue Trader has the chance to step in and influence who inherits the lot.

traits.locale_text: デンツ・ベラルドは広大な屋敷を残して逝った。自由開拓者が介入して誰が不動産を相続するかに影響を及ぼす機会がある。

languages.text: Denz Bellardo ha dejado atrás una gran fortuna. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente tiene la oportunidad de intervenir e influir en quién la hereda.
languages.original_text: Denz Bellardo left a sizable estate behind. The Rogue Trader has the chance to step in and influence who inherits the lot.

traits.locale_text: Denz Bellardo ha dejado atrás una gran fortuna. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente tiene la oportunidad de intervenir e influir en quién la hereda.

languages.text: Denz Bellardo hat ein bemerkenswertes Anwesen hinterlassen. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat die Chance, die Erbfolge zu beeinflussen.
languages.original_text: Denz Bellardo left a sizable estate behind. The Rogue Trader has the chance to step in and influence who inherits the lot.

traits.locale_text: Denz Bellardo hat ein bemerkenswertes Anwesen hinterlassen. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat die Chance, die Erbfolge zu beeinflussen.

languages.text: Denz Bellardo a laissé derrière lui un domaine impressionnant. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} peut s'en mêler et influencer l'attribution de ce bien.
languages.original_text: Denz Bellardo left a sizable estate behind. The Rogue Trader has the chance to step in and influence who inherits the lot.

traits.locale_text: Denz Bellardo a laissé derrière lui un domaine impressionnant. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} peut s'en mêler et influencer l'attribution de ce bien.

languages.text: Denz Bellardo, ardında hatırı sayılır bir servet bırakmış. Hür Tacir, ipleri eline alıp mirasın kime kalacağını belirleme fırsatına sahip.
languages.original_text: Denz Bellardo left a sizable estate behind. The Rogue Trader has the chance to step in and influence who inherits the lot.

traits.locale_text: Denz Bellardo, arkasında hatırı sayılır bir konak bıraktı. Hür Tacir ipleri eline alıp, arsanın kime kalacağını belirleme şansına sahip.
